InclusionRules.name: No hospitalization for COVID19 in the 6 months preceding admission
Has T/C drug drug era overlapping day -30 or a drug exposure in the last 60 days
No exposure to any other antihypertensives within 180 days before start-date
InclusionRules.description: This inclusion criteria varies depending on which T/C drug is being assessed (since that one will not be excluded)
